nodes.text: The Mek-Sha Tradehouse was an auction establishment located on Mek-Sha that arose following Huttbreaker's Rebellion. During the new conflict between the Galactic Republic and Sith Empire, the Alliance Commander traveled to Huttbreaker's compound and spoke to Diihara Val. After speaking, the Commander accepted a position tasked with performing requisitions in order to increase the tradehouse's supply.
